scripts.rosters:generate: ts-node --compiler-options '{"module":"commonjs"}' scripts/build-rosters.ts || node --loader ts-node/esm scripts/build-rosters.ts || node scripts/build-rosters.js
scripts.test:ts: tsc -p tsconfig.test.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.test.json && node --test "./.tmp-tests/**/*.test.js" && node -e "require('fs').rmSync('.tmp-tests', { recursive: true, force: true })"
scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p public/fonts/geist && cp node_modules/geist/dist/fonts/geist-sans/Geist-Variable.woff2 public/fonts/geist/GeistVF.woff2 && cp node_modules/geist/dist/fonts/geist-mono/GeistMono-Variable.woff2 public/fonts/geist/GeistMonoVF.woff2
